name: MATH 106
title: Systems of Ordinary Differential Equations
description: Linear systems, exponentials of operators, existence and uniqueness, stability of equilibria, periodic attractors, and applications.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): MATH 21 or AM 10; and either MATH 24 or AM 20; and either MATH 100 or CSE 101.

class_notes: Sections begin Tuesday, Jan. 16th for Winter 2024.
